text: Allan Maldonado (born 22 May 1994) is a Guatemalan karateka. At the 2019 Pan American Games held in Lima, Peru he won one of the bronze medals in the men's kumite 75 kg event. He has been coached by Cheili González. == References == Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Guatemalan male karateka Category:Pan American Games medalists in karate Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Guatemala Category:Karateka at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Competitors at the 2018 Central American and Caribbean Games Category:Central American and Caribbean Games gold medalists for Guatemala Category:Central American and Caribbean Games medalists in karate
title: Allan Maldonado
